{{also|Töchter}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|tohter}}, from {{inh|de|goh|tohter}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*duhtēr}}, from {{inh|de|ine-pro|*dʰugh₂tḗr}}.
